title: Taken by Sin
description: I was only visiting the orphanage for a charitable donation. Okay, okay. It was a tax write-off.But when I met Mags and heard she was about to be plucked from the system I knew what I needed to do.I wanted her.And now, I have her.My name is Sin, and she is mine.I’ve aged out of the system, knowing only what I’ve learned being raised by nuns in a catholic orphanage. I’ve lived a sheltered life and now that I’ve met Sin, he wants to expose me to every lustful act known to man.My name is Magnolia Fenley, and my entire world is about to change.
author: H.L. Swan
